question: when did the astros change from the national league to the american league
chain_of_thought_result: The Houston Astros changed from the National League to the American League in 2013. Specifically, this transition was officially announced on November 18, 2011, and took effect for the 2013 Major League Baseball season. This move was part of a larger realignment of the league that included the addition of a second wild card team in each league.
